articles.author: Sarah Jacob
articles.title: China Puts Export Controls on Nexperia After Dutch Takeover - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: China is blocking Nexperia from exporting products from the Asian nation after the Dutch government moved to seize control of the chipmaker.
articles.content:
China is blocking Nexperia from exporting products from the Asian nation after the Dutch government moved to seize control of the chipmaker.
China retaliated after the Dutch government invoked a Col… [+242 chars]
